data.message:
Love your music Eminem. Also love Trump. 🎣🔫🇺🇸

I'm gonna ignore your politics and keep listening to your music because that's how much your opinion means to me. If you don't like it...then scream for me. Trump 2020 🇺🇸

UPDATE: Hundreds of anti-American, Nazi Trump haters commented, and their anguish makes me feel soooo good! God, I wish I recorded me filling out that voter ballot so I could relive the moment over and over again! I will in 2020, and Eminem's President is going to be re-elected by ME! Ha ha!

 Me in 2020: "I should have known better when you started to act weird
We could've, hey! where you going? get back here!
You can't run from me, Em!
It's just us, nobody else!
You're only making this harder on yourself!
Ha! ha! got ya!
Ha! go ahead, yell!
Here I'll scream with you! 
Trump 2020! Go to hell!" 🇺🇸

replies.message: And I don't care 'bout him. Gonne keep going like his rant had no impact at all. He is either preaching to the choir on the political left or he is being ignored by the political right.
https://i.imgur.com/dj34O8L.gif
Look at the real snowflakes mad.
You obviously care about him enough to type to someone that wont read it or care about you. Nice try though
But he said fuck you. So just walk away with a downcast look
i dont understand how american can ignore so badly all the stupid things that trump says everyday...
30+ of you folks read it already.
Look at you James...being all rational and shit. Not a good look on the internet. ;)
Yeah and Trump got him talkin about the result of MY 2016 vote.

Unfollowing him. He doesn't know what he's talking about. Trump has America running great at a business perspective. Stocks are highest they've been in a while. Only thing that's wrong in America right now is cops getting out of order and the people killing this nation from the inside out...like eminem. Instead of doing anything to change it...he just raps about hate. Add on to the storm ya idiot!
Christopher,  we just  reported job loses for the first time in 7 years.
Your vote was probably uneducated because there are bringing their rapists and murderers right?
Speaking out is change in itself Mark.
Mark Spellacy plenty of white people hate Trump too and appreciate Eminem. You're the trash.
Haters gonna hate. Someone gotta bring this country back from the damage those in power have done. Trump is makin it happen, like it or not
Look like James hairline boycotting his head
Christopher Kever are you really that mind fucked? Uneducated morons crack me up. How about you look at the facts? I'm sure you look at alternitive facts all the time.
Source for job losses?
Mark Spellacy Umm i think more white people buys his music lmao....
He's created more jobs than Obama did what are u even talking about
Hahaha. Great comment. Exactly how I see it.
Seb Dufour like?

You people act like somebody can change an entire nation in a few months nobody can even possibly do that nobody's done anything but complain about Trump the entire time saying goes on all these vacations we don't pay for his salary so what does it matter to us he's doing what he's supposed to do he needs to be more harsh on the police that's where the problem is
If you don't care then what the F**k are you doing on his page commenting!!! 🤔
